018package net.sf.hajdbc.cache;
019
020import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
021import java.sql.ResultSet;
022import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;
023import java.sql.SQLException;
024import java.sql.Statement;
025import java.util.AbstractMap;
026import java.util.ArrayList;
027import java.util.Arrays;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.Collections;
030import java.util.HashMap;
031import java.util.HashSet;
032import java.util.LinkedList;
033import java.util.List;
034import java.util.Map;
035import java.util.Map.Entry;
036import java.util.Set;
037import java.util.regex.Pattern;
038
039import net.sf.hajdbc.ColumnProperties;
040import net.sf.hajdbc.ForeignKeyConstraint;
041import net.sf.hajdbc.Messages;
042import net.sf.hajdbc.QualifiedName;
043import net.sf.hajdbc.SequenceProperties;
044import net.sf.hajdbc.SequenceSupport;
045import net.sf.hajdbc.UniqueConstraint;
046import net.sf.hajdbc.dialect.Dialect;
047import net.sf.hajdbc.util.Resources;
048import net.sf.hajdbc.util.Strings;
049
050/**
051 * Processes database meta data into useful structures.
052 * @author Paul Ferraro
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings("nls")
055public class DatabaseMetaDataSupportImpl implements DatabaseMetaDataSupport
056{
057        // As defined in SQL-92 specification: http://www.andrew.cmu.edu/user/shadow/sql/sql1992.txt
058        private static final String[] SQL_92_RESERVED_WORDS = new String[] {
059                "ABSOLUTE", "ACTION", "ADD", "ALL", "ALLOCATE", "ALTER", "AND", "ANY", "ARE", "AS", "ASC", "ASSERTION", "AT", "AUTHORIZATION", "AVG",
060                "BEGIN", "BETWEEN", "BIT", "BIT_LENGTH", "BOTH", "BY",
061                "CASCADE", "CASCADED", "CASE", "CAST", "CATALOG", "CHAR", "CHARACTER", "CHAR_LENGTH", "CHARACTER_LENGTH", "CHECK", "CLOSE", "COALESCE", "COLLATE", "COLLATION", "COLUMN", "COMMIT", "CONNECT", "CONNECTION", "CONSTRAINT", "CONSTRAINTS", "CONTINUE", "CONVERT", "CORRESPONDING", "COUNT", "CREATE", "CROSS", "CURRENT", "CURRENT_DATE", "CURRENT_TIME", "CURRENT_TIMESTAMP", "CURRENT_USER", "CURSOR",
062                "DATE", "DAY", "DEALLOCATE", "DEC", "DECIMAL", "DECLARE", "DEFAULT", "DEFERRABLE", "DEFERRED", "DELETE", "DESC", "DESCRIBE", "DESCRIPTOR", "DIAGNOSTICS", "DISCONNECT", "DISTINCT", "DOMAIN", "DOUBLE", "DROP",
063                "ELSE", "END", "END-EXEC", "ESCAPE", "EXCEPT", "EXCEPTION", "EXEC", "EXECUTE", "EXISTS", "EXTERNAL", "EXTRACT",
064                "FALSE", "FETCH", "FIRST", "FLOAT", "FOR", "FOREIGN", "FOUND", "FROM", "FULL",
065                "GET", "GLOBAL", "GO", "GOTO", "GRANT", "GROUP",
066                "HAVING", "HOUR",
067                "IDENTITY", "IMMEDIATE", "IN", "INDICATOR", "INITIALLY", "INNER", "INPUT", "INSENSITIVE", "INSERT", "INT", "INTEGER", "INTERSECT", "INTERVAL", "INTO", "IS", "ISOLATION",
068                "JOIN",
069                "KEY",
070                "LANGUAGE", "LAST", "LEADING", "LEFT", "LEVEL", "LIKE", "LOCAL", "LOWER",
071                "MATCH", "MAX", "MIN", "MINUTE", "MODULE", "MONTH",
072                "NAMES", "NATIONAL", "NATURAL", "NCHAR", "NEXT", "NO", "NOT", "NULL", "NULLIF", "NUMERIC",
073                "OCTET_LENGTH", "OF", "ON", "ONLY", "OPEN", "OPTION", "OR", "ORDER", "OUTER", "OUTPUT", "OVERLAPS",
074                "PAD", "PARTIAL", "POSITION", "PRECISION", "PREPARE", "PRESERVE", "PRIMARY", "PRIOR", "PRIVILEGES", "PROCEDURE", "PUBLIC",
075                "READ", "REAL", "REFERENCES", "RELATIVE", "RESTRICT", "REVOKE", "RIGHT", "ROLLBACK", "ROWS",
076                "SCHEMA", "SCROLL", "SECOND", "SECTION", "SELECT", "SESSION", "SESSION_USER", "SET", "SIZE", "SMALLINT", "SOME", "SPACE", "SQL", "SQLCODE", "SQLERROR", "SQLSTATE", "SUBSTRING", "SUM", "SYSTEM_USER",
077                "TABLE", "TEMPORARY", "THEN", "TIME", "TIMESTAMP", "TIMEZONE_HOUR", "TIMEZONE_MINUTE", "TO", "TRAILING", "TRANSACTION", "TRANSLATE", "TRANSLATION", "TRIM", "TRUE",
078                "UNION", "UNIQUE", "UNKNOWN", "UPDATE", "UPPER", "USAGE", "USER", "USING",
079                "VALUE", "VALUES", "VARCHAR", "VARYING", "VIEW",
080                "WHEN", "WHENEVER", "WHERE", "WITH", "WORK", "WRITE",
081                "YEAR",
082                "ZONE"
083        };
084        
085        private static final Pattern UPPER_CASE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("[A-Z]");
086        private static final Pattern LOWER_CASE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("[a-z]");
087        
088        private final Dialect dialect;
089        private final Set<String> reservedIdentifierSet = new HashSet<String>(SQL_92_RESERVED_WORDS.length);
090        private final Pattern identifierPattern;
091        private final String quote;
092        private final boolean supportsMixedCaseIdentifiers;
093        private final boolean supportsMixedCaseQuotedIdentifiers;
094        private final boolean storesLowerCaseIdentifiers;
095        private final boolean storesLowerCaseQuotedIdentifiers;
096        private final boolean storesUpperCaseIdentifiers;
097        private final boolean storesUpperCaseQuotedIdentifiers;
098        private final boolean supportsSchemasInDDL;
099        private final boolean supportsSchemasInDML;
100        
101        /**
102         * Constructs a new DatabaseMetaDataSupport using the specified DatabaseMetaData implementation.
103         * @param metaData a DatabaseMetaData implementation
104         * @param dialect the vendor-specific dialect of the cluster
105         * @throws SQLException if an error occurs access DatabaseMetaData
106         */
107        public DatabaseMetaDataSupportImpl(DatabaseMetaData metaData, Dialect dialect) throws SQLException
108        {
109                this.dialect = dialect;
110                
111                this.identifierPattern = dialect.getIdentifierPattern(metaData);
112                this.quote = metaData.getIdentifierQuoteString();
113                this.supportsMixedCaseIdentifiers = metaData.supportsMixedCaseIdentifiers();
114                this.supportsMixedCaseQuotedIdentifiers = metaData.supportsMixedCaseQuotedIdentifiers();
115                this.storesLowerCaseIdentifiers = metaData.storesLowerCaseIdentifiers();
116                this.storesLowerCaseQuotedIdentifiers = metaData.storesLowerCaseQuotedIdentifiers();
117                this.storesUpperCaseIdentifiers = metaData.storesUpperCaseIdentifiers();
118                this.storesUpperCaseQuotedIdentifiers = metaData.storesUpperCaseQuotedIdentifiers();
119                this.supportsSchemasInDML = metaData.supportsSchemasInDataManipulation();
120                this.supportsSchemasInDDL = metaData.supportsSchemasInTableDefinitions();
121                
122                this.reservedIdentifierSet.addAll(Arrays.asList(SQL_92_RESERVED_WORDS));
123                
124                for (String word: metaData.getSQLKeywords().split(Strings.COMMA))
125                {
126                        this.reservedIdentifierSet.add(word.toUpperCase());
127                }
128        }
129        
130        /**
131         * Returns all tables in this database mapped by schema.
132         * @param metaData a DatabaseMetaData implementation
133         * @return a Map of schema name to Collection of table names
134         * @throws SQLException if an error occurs access DatabaseMetaData
135         */
136        @Override
137        public Collection<QualifiedName> getTables(DatabaseMetaData metaData) throws SQLException
138        {
139                ResultSet resultSet = metaData.getTables(this.getCatalog(metaData), null, Strings.ANY, new String[] { "TABLE" });
140                
141                try
142                {
143                        List<QualifiedName> list = new LinkedList<QualifiedName>();
144                        
145                        while (resultSet.next())
146                        {
147                                list.add(new QualifiedNameImpl(resultSet.getString("TABLE_SCHEM"), resultSet.getString("TABLE_NAME"), this.supportsSchemasInDDL, this.supportsSchemasInDML));
148                        }
149                        
150                        return list;
151                }
152                finally
153                {
154                        Resources.close(resultSet);
155                }
156        }
157
158        /**
159         * Returns the columns of the specified table.
160         * @param metaData a DatabaseMetaData implementation
161         * @param table a schema qualified table name
162         * @return a Map of column name to column properties
163         * @throws SQLException if an error occurs access DatabaseMetaData
164         */
165        @Override
166        public Map<String, ColumnProperties> getColumns(DatabaseMetaData metaData, QualifiedName table) throws SQLException
167        {
168                Statement statement = metaData.getConnection().createStatement();
169                
170                try
171                {
172                        Map<String, ColumnProperties> columnMap = new HashMap<String, ColumnProperties>();
173                        
174                        ResultSetMetaData resultSet = statement.executeQuery(String.format("SELECT * FROM %s WHERE 0=1", table.getDMLName())).getMetaData();
175                        
176                        for (int i = 1; i <= resultSet.getColumnCount(); ++i)
177                        {
178                                String column = this.quote(resultSet.getColumnName(i));
179                                int type = resultSet.getColumnType(i);
180                                String nativeType = resultSet.getColumnTypeName(i);
181                                boolean autoIncrement = resultSet.isAutoIncrement(i);
182                                
183                                columnMap.put(column, new ColumnPropertiesImpl(column, type, nativeType, null, null, autoIncrement));
184                        }
185                        
186                        return columnMap;
187                }
188                finally
189                {
190                        Resources.close(statement);
191                }
192        }
193
194        /**
195         * Returns the primary key of the specified table.
196         * @param metaData a DatabaseMetaData implementation
197         * @param table a schema qualified table name
198         * @return a unique constraint
199         * @throws SQLException if an error occurs access DatabaseMetaData
200         */
201        @Override
202        public UniqueConstraint getPrimaryKey(DatabaseMetaData metaData, QualifiedName table) throws SQLException
203        {
204                ResultSet resultSet = metaData.getPrimaryKeys(this.getCatalog(metaData), table.getSchema(), table.getName());
205                
206                try
207                {
208                        UniqueConstraint constraint = null;
209
210                        while (resultSet.next())
211                        {
212                                String name = this.quote(resultSet.getString("PK_NAME"));
213        
214                                if (constraint == null)
215                                {
216                                        constraint = new UniqueConstraintImpl(name, table);
217                                }
218                                
219                                String column = this.quote(resultSet.getString("COLUMN_NAME"));
220                                
221                                constraint.getColumnList().add(column);
222                        }
223                        
224                        return constraint;
225                }
226                finally
227                {
228                        Resources.close(resultSet);
229                }
230        }
231
232        /**
233         * Returns the foreign key constraints on the specified table.
234         * @param metaData a DatabaseMetaData implementation
235         * @param table a schema qualified table name
236         * @return a Collection of foreign key constraints.
237         * @throws SQLException if an error occurs access DatabaseMetaData
238         */
239        @Override
240        public Collection<ForeignKeyConstraint> getForeignKeyConstraints(DatabaseMetaData metaData, QualifiedName table) throws SQLException
241        {
242                ResultSet resultSet = metaData.getImportedKeys(this.getCatalog(metaData), table.getSchema(), table.getName());
243                
244                try
245                {
246                        Map<String, ForeignKeyConstraint> foreignKeyMap = new HashMap<String, ForeignKeyConstraint>();
247                        
248                        while (resultSet.next())
249                        {
250                                String name = this.quote(resultSet.getString("FK_NAME"));
251                                
252                                ForeignKeyConstraint foreignKey = foreignKeyMap.get(name);
253                                
254                                if (foreignKey == null)
255                                {
256                                        foreignKey = new ForeignKeyConstraintImpl(name, table);
257                                        
258                                        foreignKey.setForeignTable(new QualifiedNameImpl(this.quote(resultSet.getString("PKTABLE_SCHEM")), this.quote(resultSet.getString("PKTABLE_NAME")), this.supportsSchemasInDDL, this.supportsSchemasInDML));
259                                        foreignKey.setDeleteRule(resultSet.getInt("DELETE_RULE"));
260                                        foreignKey.setUpdateRule(resultSet.getInt("UPDATE_RULE"));
261                                        foreignKey.setDeferrability(resultSet.getInt("DEFERRABILITY"));
262                                        
263                                        foreignKeyMap.put(name, foreignKey);
264                                }
265                                
266                                String column = this.quote(resultSet.getString("FKCOLUMN_NAME"));
267                                String foreignColumn = this.quote(resultSet.getString("PKCOLUMN_NAME"));
268        
269                                foreignKey.getColumnList().add(column);
270                                foreignKey.getForeignColumnList().add(foreignColumn);
271                        }
272                        
273                        return foreignKeyMap.values();
274                }
275                finally
276                {
277                        Resources.close(resultSet);
278                }
279        }
280
281        /**
282         * Returns the unique constraints on the specified table - excluding the primary key of the table.
283         * @param metaData a schema qualified table name
284         * @param table a qualified table name
285         * @param primaryKey the primary key of this table
286         * @return a Collection of unique constraints.
287         * @throws SQLException if an error occurs access DatabaseMetaData
288         */
289        @Override
290        public Collection<UniqueConstraint> getUniqueConstraints(DatabaseMetaData metaData, QualifiedName table, UniqueConstraint primaryKey) throws SQLException
291        {
292                ResultSet resultSet = metaData.getIndexInfo(this.getCatalog(metaData), table.getSchema(), table.getName(), true, false);
293                
294                try
295                {
296                        Map<String, UniqueConstraint> keyMap = new HashMap<String, UniqueConstraint>();
297                        
298                        while (resultSet.next())
299                        {
300                                if (resultSet.getShort("TYPE") == DatabaseMetaData.tableIndexHashed)
301                                {
302                                        String name = this.quote(resultSet.getString("INDEX_NAME"));
303                                        
304                                        // Don't include the primary key
305                                        if ((primaryKey != null) && name.equals(primaryKey.getName())) continue;
306                                        
307                                        UniqueConstraint key = keyMap.get(name);
308                                        
309                                        if (key == null)
310                                        {
311                                                key = new UniqueConstraintImpl(name, table);
312                                                
313                                                keyMap.put(name, key);
314                                        }
315                                        
316                                        String column = this.quote(resultSet.getString("COLUMN_NAME"));
317                                        
318                                        key.getColumnList().add(column);
319                                }
320                        }
321                        return keyMap.values();
322                }
323                finally
324                {
325                        Resources.close(resultSet);
326                }
327        }
328        
329        private String getCatalog(DatabaseMetaData metaData) throws SQLException
330        {
331                String catalog = metaData.getConnection().getCatalog();
332                
333                return (catalog != null) ? catalog : Strings.EMPTY;
334        }
335        
336        private String quote(String identifier)
337        {
338                if (identifier == null) return null;
339                
340                int quoteLength = this.quote.length();
341                
342                boolean quoted = identifier.startsWith(this.quote) && identifier.endsWith(this.quote);
343                // Strip any existing quoting
344                String raw = quoted ? identifier.substring(quoteLength, identifier.length() - quoteLength) : identifier;
345                
346                // Quote reserved identifiers
347                boolean requiresQuoting = this.reservedIdentifierSet.contains(raw.toUpperCase());
348                
349                // Quote identifiers containing special characters
350                requiresQuoting |= !this.identifierPattern.matcher(raw).matches();
351                
352                // Quote mixed-case identifiers if detected and supported by DBMS
353                requiresQuoting |= quoted && !this.supportsMixedCaseIdentifiers && this.supportsMixedCaseQuotedIdentifiers && ((this.storesLowerCaseIdentifiers && !this.storesLowerCaseQuotedIdentifiers && UPPER_CASE_PATTERN.matcher(raw).find()) || (this.storesUpperCaseIdentifiers && !this.storesUpperCaseQuotedIdentifiers && LOWER_CASE_PATTERN.matcher(raw).find()));
354                
355                return requiresQuoting ? this.quote + this.normalizeCaseQuoted(raw) + this.quote : this.normalizeCase(raw);
356        }
357        
358        private String normalizeCase(String identifier)
359        {
360                if (this.storesLowerCaseIdentifiers) return identifier.toLowerCase();
361                
362                if (this.storesUpperCaseIdentifiers) return identifier.toUpperCase();
363                
364                return identifier;
365        }
366        
367        private String normalizeCaseQuoted(String identifier)
368        {
369                if (this.storesLowerCaseQuotedIdentifiers) return identifier.toLowerCase();
370                
371                if (this.storesUpperCaseQuotedIdentifiers) return identifier.toUpperCase();
372                
373                return identifier;
374        }
375        
376        private QualifiedName normalize(String qualifiedName, String defaultSchema)
377        {
378                String parts[] = qualifiedName.split(Pattern.quote(Strings.DOT));
379
380                String name = parts[parts.length - 1];
381                String schema = (parts.length > 1) ? parts[parts.length - 2] : defaultSchema;
382                        
383                return new QualifiedNameImpl(this.quote(schema), this.quote(name), this.supportsSchemasInDDL, this.supportsSchemasInDML);
384        }
385        
386        /**
387         * Returns a collection of sequences using dialect specific logic.
388         * @param metaData database meta data
389         * @return a collection of sequences
390         * @throws SQLException
391         */
392        @Override
393        public Collection<SequenceProperties> getSequences(DatabaseMetaData metaData) throws SQLException
394        {
395                SequenceSupport support = this.dialect.getSequenceSupport();
396                
397                if (support == null) return Collections.emptyList();
398                
399                Map<QualifiedName, Integer> sequences = support.getSequences(metaData);
400                
401                List<SequenceProperties> sequenceList = new ArrayList<SequenceProperties>(sequences.size());
402                
403                for (Map.Entry<QualifiedName, Integer> sequence: sequences.entrySet())
404                {
405                        sequenceList.add(new SequencePropertiesImpl(sequence.getKey(), sequence.getValue()));
406                }
407                
408                return sequenceList;
409        }
410        
411        /**
412         * Locates an object from a map keyed by schema qualified name.
413         * @param <T> an object
414         * @param map a map of database 
415         * @param name the name of the object to locate
416         * @param defaultSchemaList a list of default schemas
417         * @return the object with the specified name
418         * @throws SQLException
419         */
420        @Override
421        public <T> T find(Map<QualifiedName, T> map, String name, List<String> defaultSchemaList) throws SQLException
422        {
423                T properties = map.get(this.normalize(name, null));
424                
425                if (properties == null)
426                {
427                        for (String schema: defaultSchemaList)
428                        {
429                                properties = map.get(this.normalize(name, schema));
430                                if (properties != null) break;
431                        }
432                }
433                
434                if (properties == null)
435                {
436                        throw new SQLException(Messages.SCHEMA_LOOKUP_FAILED.getMessage(name, defaultSchemaList, this.dialect.getClass().getName() + ".getDefaultSchemas()"));
437                }
438                
439                return properties;
440        }
441        
442        /**
443         * Identifies any identity columns from the from the specified collection of columns
444         * @param columns the columns of a table
445         * @return a collection of column names
446         * @throws SQLException
447         */
448        @Override
449        public Collection<String> getIdentityColumns(Collection<ColumnProperties> columns) throws SQLException
450        {
451                List<String> columnList = new LinkedList<String>();
452                
453                for (ColumnProperties column: columns)
454                {
455                        if (column.isAutoIncrement())
456                        {
457                                columnList.add(column.getName());
458                        }
459                }
460                
461                return columnList;
462        }
463
464        /**
465         * {@inheritDoc}
466         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupport#getTypes(java.sql.DatabaseMetaData)
467         */
468        @Override
469        public Map<Integer, Entry<String, Integer>> getTypes(DatabaseMetaData metaData) throws SQLException
470        {
471                ResultSet resultSet = metaData.getTypeInfo();
472                
473                try
474                {
475                        Map<Integer, Map.Entry<String, Integer>> types = new HashMap<Integer, Map.Entry<String, Integer>>();
476                        
477                        while (resultSet.next())
478                        {
479                                int type = resultSet.getInt("DATA_TYPE");
480                                if (!types.containsKey(type))
481                                {
482                                        String name = resultSet.getString("TYPE_NAME");
483                                        String params = resultSet.getString("CREATE_PARAMS");
484                                        types.put(type, new AbstractMap.SimpleImmutableEntry<String, Integer>(name, (params != null) ? resultSet.getInt("PRECISION") : null));
485                                }
486                        }
487                        
488                        return types;
489                }
490                finally
491                {
492                        Resources.close(resultSet);
493                }
494        }
495}
